cluding training in directing, producing and lighting seeks a position which will

ington, NY. Producer - Motion Picture Training Films, 2 years, U.S. Naval

May 64. PROGRAM DIRECTOR-WRITER-ANNOUNCER, now employed in commercial radio at
$6500 a year, will accept a cut in pay in exchange for constructive work in ed¬
ucational field. Professional writer for six years, five of them in radio plus
half-year in TV. Exceptionally good announcer. Possessor of 32 years,one wife,
three children, college degree classical music library and highly developed
distaste for Business Broadcasting.
May 65. Industrial Designer-Artist desires full-time position in Educational TV
as Art Director. Will "double" as Production Assistant. College graduate. 6
years experience product design, advertising art, model making, small shop
operation. Knowledge of TV Station Operation and procedures; has handled all
phases TV art, Flip—cards to Set Design, at Educational Station. Prefer North
East or North Central States.
